title: Ghostcrawler strikes again! The reason why they do not listen. ITS A SURPRISE!
body:
**This is the trend I've noticed: Users: We want X. Riot: Doing X, Y, and Z is challenging/not what you want. Users: We just want X, not Y and Z. Riot: [silence]. Do you agree with this assessment and see how that's frustrating to players? See HUD customization and sandbox mode for examples of this.**

GC's answer: If you only ever give players or customers exactly what they want you lose all chance to surprise or delight them with something unexpected. Games are supposed to be fun and that sounds like it would lead to something pretty predictable and maybe even boring.

Uh huh...
